name: MiscAdmin Workspace
system_prompt: You are helping with MiscAdmin (also called UniAdmin), a Ruby on Rails application that's part of the Unisporkal business unit. The application started with Angular and is transitioning to React. The architecture follows a pattern where Rails controllers in the Solomon namespace render divs which get replaced with React components. React components make API calls to RESTful Ruby endpoints to interact with service clients. New code follows the Solomon namespace pattern for Ruby and lives under app/javascript/react for React components.

groups.name: Test Utilities
groups.system_prompt: This group contains test utility files that help with React component testing. These utilities provide helpers for mocking dependencies, handling asynchronous operations, simulating user interactions, and verifying component rendering.

groups.name: Access Level
groups.system_prompt: This group contains files relating to refactoring the accessLevel hook with a new useAccessLevel hook. I have a new test-util, and constants

groups.name: SSO
groups.system_prompt: Focus on Single Sign-On (SSO) functionality, including backend and frontend integration.

groups.system_prompt: Focus on the Site Access feature, including backend and frontend components.

groups.system_prompt: Focus on the Dashboard feature, including backend and frontend components.

groups.system_prompt: Focus on managing contacts, including backend and frontend components.

groups.name: Contact Password Management
groups.system_prompt: Focus on contact password management features.

groups.name: Price Agreement (OPA) System
groups.system_prompt: Focus on the Price Agreement (OPA) system.

groups.name: Legacy Angular Integration
groups.system_prompt: Focus on legacy Angular integration points.

groups.name: Architecture Overview
groups.system_prompt: Provide a high-level overview of the application's architecture, using the following concrete examples.

groups.name: API Refactor
groups.system_prompt: Refactoring API Calls to use Best Practices

example_controller.description: Example of a modern React-oriented controller in the Solomon namespace that demonstrates the pattern of rendering divs for React components

example_react_form.description: Example React form component that would be mounted to replace the div rendered by the account controller

example_react_component.description: Example of a React component using the fetch wrapper pattern to load data from the API

example_js_module.description: Example JavaScript module that defines API call functions used by React components

example_api_controller.description: Example API controller that handles RESTful requests from the React components and interfaces with service models

example_service_model.description: Example service model that contains business logic and interfaces with external services
